title: US Lawmakers Press Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen on Crypto Oversight Gaps
description: Four U.S. lawmakers have pressed Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen regarding crypto oversight gaps. The Financial Stability Oversight Council (FSOC), which Yellen chairs, has issued “repeated warnings about the lack of oversight of the digital asset markets,” the lawmakers detailed, questioning Yellen how the council believes existing laws should apply bitcoin, ether, and non-security crypto assets. […]

title: Can ‘Self-Discover’ Revolutionize LLM Performance? Google Deepmind Thinks So
description: In a landmark development within the realm of artificial intelligence research, Google Deepmind, in collaboration with the University of Southern California (USC), has unveiled a groundbreaking ‘self-discover’ prompting framework.  This framework, detailed in a recent publication on arXiv and Hugging Face, signifies a paradigm shift in the enhancement of large language models (LLMs) such as […]
